column4: Here is a problem I need to solve... My netcards are always inactive on boot. I have to manually acitvate them which is tiresome and shouldn't be necessary. I have also noticed an error when shutting down the machine "Deconfiguring network interfaces ... Fail" Any ideas?
easier way is to build your kernel :)
you can build the nic driver in kernel, so, it's always enabled
also, you can get a newer kernel, in which the driver problem is already fixed
